short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage bookmarks for ChatGPT conversations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Bookmark r is a simple and easy-to-use extension for managing bookmarks while using the ChatGPT platform. This extension provides a bookmark container on the right side of the screen, allowing you to easily save and access bookmarks while engaging in conversations with ChatGPT.

With the extension, you can add bookmarks with a custom name, or have it auto-fetch the name of the webpage you're on. You can also scroll up and down to view your bookmarks and shift them up or down to reorder them according to your preference. Additionally, you can delete bookmarks that you no longer need.

The extension features a transparent theme to match the ChatGPT UI and has a transition effect when shifting bookmarks. It does not have a popup file, as the bookmark container resides in the ChatGPT page UI on the right side of the screen.
